TOP EVENT PLANNING, DESIGN & PRODUCTION

LOS ANGELES | SAN FRANCISCO | MIAMI | LAS VEGAS

Whether you are planning a social event, a corporate launch party, or an edgy baby shower, the team at ROCKNEVENTS is here to bring it all to life - without a hitch! We are expanding event firms located in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Miami, and Manhattan, NYC. - worldwide so our rockstars can expand on the most timeless and out-of-the-box events. From day-of productions to our affordable Full-Service journey, our talented team and detailed collection items promise to bring all types of sublime experiences. ROCKNEVENTS is a worldwide traveling company. Wherever your experience is, TEAM RNE will be there. Contact us for a free consultation today!

OUR REPUTATION

“Thanks to ROCKNEVENTS I had a FLAWLESS and more perfect event than I could even imagine. RNE far exceeded my expectations. They were a perfect combo of fairy godmothers and NINJAS on the night of, right down to the detail of making sure I ate some food. They made use of EVERY tiny piece of decor I had purchased over the months. It. Was. Perfect.”

— BREE M.
